items.title: Workplace Diversity and Social Programs Thrive by Going Undercover
items.description: Political opposition to DEI and CSR has led many companies to stop communicating about their policies — but that doesn’t mean they aren’t using them.

items.title: How Patreon and Kajabi Have Helped Creators Earn a Combined $20 Billion
items.description: Both creator economy companies announced reaching the milestone this week.

items.title: Stop Grinding. Start Building Workplace Joy
items.description: From employee clubs to passion-driven assignments, here’s how to make work engaging.

items.title: Figma’s IPO Was a Hit. Here Are 8 More to Watch in 2025
items.description: The IPO market appears to be thawing. These are some of the companies that could go public this year.

items.title: This Taylor Swift-Approved Brand’s Viral Moment Led to a Projected $40 Million in Sales
items.description: Beauty startup Fazit was well-prepared to capitalize on the pop star’s promotion of its product.
